Posts.EditableText:
There is an automatic save system/function/thing on both the offline version and online version. You just need a textadventures account to save, and/or have the program downloaded.

save is already a command. It saves the game.

But if you save offline (desktop), it makes a new game folder. Useful if you really need it, but not if you like to spam saves.
